name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count

reviews.name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: I love these little 6 packs. They are the perfect size, not too much not too little. If you do the math.. it's not even a dollar per can! a single 16oz at walmart is 1.65+tax. It's a really good deal, and has a really good flavor. Not too stong and never gives me heartburn like monster or red bull.
reviews.title: YUM!

reviews.name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count
reviews.reviewText:
These are 12 ounces, not the 16 ounces you buy in stores. It's the perfect size! Bigger than a red bull but smaller than a monster. I have never found this in stores, so I bought 6 more boxes.
If you like full throttle you can't beat this price.
reviews.title: Love the size

reviews.name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: While this isn't THE best buy I've ever seen, it's certainly close. And being able to have 12 6 packs shipped to your doors step is amazing. Full Throttle has a good taste that doesn't get old as quickly as most other energy drinks. The only problem is that these 12 oz cans don't provide quite enough drink to last for a whole day, so I got through them much quicker than expected.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: Love Full Throttle drinks. Great flavor. I would love to get red and blue cans in 6 packs
reviews.title: great pick me up

reviews.name: Full Throttle Citrus Flavor Energy Drink, 12 fl oz, 6 count
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely the best energy drink I have ever had. It has an amazing and full citrus taste and no bitter caffeine taste.
reviews.title: The Best Energy Drink
